alert.note: Alert for Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 2:34AM CDT until August 01 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in west central Illinois... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 233 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Windsor, or 14 miles north of Galesburg, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Galesburg, Knoxville, Wataga, Oneida, Altona, Victoria, Maquon, Rio, Gilson, East Galesburg, Henderson, Snake Den Hollow and Dahinda. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 34 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
